full-width.heading: Full Width Section
full-width.text: This layout gives you the ability to put the main content to the left

full-width-card.heading: Full Width Section - Width Cards
full-width-card.text: Full width content with sub components in slot.

split.heading: Split Section
split.text: This layout gives you the ability to put the main content to the left

reversed.heading: Reversed Split Section
reversed.text: This layout gives you the ability to put the main content to the left

stacked.heading: Stacked Split Section
stacked.text: Demonstrates how a stacked array of sections look like.

card.heading: Card Section
card.subHeading: A flexible card that transforms to a section.
card.text: This is a card that adapts to the width of the viewport.
